text: Benjamin "Ben" Guggenheim (October 26, 1865 â€“ April 15, 1912)Benjamin Guggenheim; findagrave.com was an American businessman. He died aboard the RMS Titanic when the ship sank in the North Atlantic Ocean. His body was never recovered. ==References== ==Other websites== *Encyclopedia Titanica Biography of Benjamin Guggenheim *Benjamin Guggenheim on Titanic-Titanic.com Category:1865 births Category:1912 deaths Category:Victims of the RMS Titanic Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia
